usefulItems: 12 hole muffin tin, frying pan, oven, hob
title: Full English Breakfast Popover

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 230°C. Fill a 12 hole muffin tin with ½ tsp olive oil in each hole and place in oven to preheat.

Place eggs, flour, milk, salt and pepper in mixing bowl then mix <b>15 sec/speed 6<b>. Allow to rest. Meanwhile, fry sausages and bacon in a frying pan on the hob until browned. Cut bacon slices in half.

Mix rested batter <b>5 sec/speed 5<b> then carefully pour into hot muffin tin. Top each with a piece of bacon, a sausage and 2 cherry tomato halves. Immediately return to hot oven and bake 20 minutes (230°C) until well risen. Serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Cooked cocktail sausages could also be used to make the recipe even quicker.
